text: I’ve probably asked this before but 3rd time’s a charm right?  I have a coded template with DND_areas.  User goes in and uses said template, adds modules and what not, creates two columns inside a section both with some content.  But the columns are vertically aligned center and one column is taller than the other so they want them aligned flex-start.  How can they adjust this?  (I can’t change the dnd_column alignment in the code because that will not affect an already created page). Is there no way inside the page itself to change the alignment of a column?
Screenshot for example, column on left needs to start in the same place as column on right.

Hello everyone! Just a quick question. Our company is just in the planning stages of developing new blog templates, and I wanted to see if there has been any intention by HubSpot to integrate drag and drop area support into blog templates in the future?  If so, what sort of timeline is in mind?

You can change the alignment of all the columns in the row, but not each one individually.
